name: Feed The System
description:
Dear member of our community.

We are elated to tell you that you have been chosen to volunteer in one of our most exeptional programs.

In this program, you will be caring for a very precious creature. Your job is to decend to it's natural habitat and feed it with our provided top quality meat. In return it will lay eggs which are of great value to us. Collect them, return safely to ground level and be celebrated as one of our heroes.

You are expected to immediately report to the authorities and handle this matter with absolute confidentiality.


Known Bugs:
Sometimes you can't collect the eggs or the food, if that happens go back to the menu and start the game again. 

It can happen that you will have a minor bug, if you get killed by the enemy. It's not game breaking, you can just keep playing, even if the doors of the elevator are not closing correctly
If the enemy is weirdly stuck, die in the water or wait, there is an emergency respawn for the enemy.
